channel.title: CVE Feed for PluginEver -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PluginEver -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-35173|2024-05-17T10:19:49.334Z -- PluginEver -- Serial Numbers for WooCommerce – License Manager
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in PluginEver Serial Numbers for WooCommerce – License Manager.This issue affects Serial Numbers for WooCommerce – License Manager: from n/a through 1.7.3.

item.title: CVE-2023-45053|2024-06-04T09:14:33.076Z -- pluginever -- WP Content Pilot – Autoblogging & Affiliate Marketing Plugin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in pluginever WP Content Pilot – Autoblogging & Affiliate Marketing Plugin allows Code Injection.This issue affects WP Content Pilot – Autoblogging & Affiliate Marketing Plugin: from n/a through 1.3.3.
